title: One Last Dance
lyrics:
[Intro]
Ha, ha, ha
Ha, ha, ha
[Verse 1]
Sometimes I wander down the street
The place I swept you off your feet
I haven't seen you here in a while
That drink you love still taste the same
The DJ hasn't changed
He just put on our favorite record right now
[Pre-Chorus]
When that melody plays
And I see your face
The memories race
Right back to me
[Chorus]
And I hope you give me one last dance
Head on my shoulder like it ain't over
Oh, this moment gave us one more chance
Why don't wе hold it before the bar closеs?
One last dance (One last dance)
One last dance (One last dance)
Oh, yeah

[Verse 2]
Is it wrong to reminisce?
Is it wrong to steal a kiss?
Is someone waiting for you at home?
Woah, tonight could be the only night
A fleeting glimpse, what could we might've been
If we had never let go?
[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, when that melody plays
I whisper your name
I want you to stay
Right next to me
[Chorus]
And I hope you give me one last dance
Head on my shoulder like it ain't over
Oh, this moment gave us one more chance
Why don't we hold it before the bar closes?
One last dance (One last dance)
One last dance (One last dance)
Ah, yeah
[Bridge]
Oh, when that melody plays
The crowd starts to fade
I need you to stay

[Chorus]
And I hope you give me one last dance
Head on my shoulder like it ain't over
Oh, this moment gave us one more chance
Why don't we hold it before the bar closes?
And I hope you give me one last dance
Head on my shoulder like it ain't over
Oh, this moment gave us one more chance
Why don't we hold it before the bar closes?
One last dance (One last dance)
Oh, yes, one last dance (One last dance)
Yeah, one last dance
